item.description:
and the Bull??
Let's get together again at the brewery Exchange to watch the second game in the series of the Sox vs Yankees. We will meet upstairs by the big screens to enjoy the food, drink and good company while cheering on the home team...maybe get to see some good bull riding, or hear some good bull, or play a little pool or air hockey or just laugh together. See you there!

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Baseball Burgers, Brews
